gurmukhi: ਅਾਪਦਾ ਅਧੀਨ ਜੈਸੇ ਦੁਖਤ ਦੁਹਾਗਨ ਕੳੁ ਸਹਜਿ ਸੁਹਾਗ ਨ ਸੁਹਾਗਨ ਕੋ ਭਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Aapadaa Adheen Jaisay Doukhat Duhaagan Kau , Sahaji Suhaag N Suhaagan Ko Bhaavaee ?
translation: Just as a distressed, divorced woman cannot bear to see or tolerate the loving and happy union of another woman with her husband,

gurmukhi: ਬਿਰਹਨੀ ਬਿਰਹ ਬਿਓਗ ਮੈ ਸੰਜੋਗਨਿ ਕੋ ਸੁੰਦਰ ਸਿੰਗਾਰਿ ਅਧਿਕਾਰੁ ਨ ਸੁਹਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Birahanee Birah Biaog Mai Sanjogani Ko , Soundar Singaari Adhikaaru N Suhaavaee ?
translation: Just as a woman separated from her husband and bearing the pangs of separation cannot tolerate the embellishments of another woman who is united with her husband,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤਨ ਮਾਂਝਿ ਬਾਂਝਿ ਰੋਗ ਸੋਗ ਸੰਸੋ ਸ੍ਰਮ ਸੳੁਤ ਕੇ ਸੁਤਹਿ ਪੇਖਿ ਮਹਾਂ ਦੁਖ ਪਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Jaisay Tan Maanjhi Baanjhi Rog Sog Sanso Srama , Saout Kay Soutahi Paykhi Mahaan Doukh Paavaee ?
translation: Just as a distressed and fatigued woman suffering from her inability to bear a child feels much distressed on seeing the son of her co-wife,

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਪਰ ਤਨ ਧਨ ਦੂਖਨ ਤ੍ਰਿਦੋਖ ਮਮ ਸਾਧਨ ਕੋ ਸੁਕ੍ਰਤ ਨ ਹਿਰਦੈ ਹਿਤਾਵੲੀ ॥੫੧੩॥
transliteration: Taisay Par Tan Dhan Dookhan Tridokh Mama , Saadhan Ko Soukrat N Hiradai Hitaavaee ?513?
translation: Similarly I am infested with three chronic ailments-namely other's women, other's wealth and slander. And that is why praise of the devoted and loving Sikhs of the True Guru does not please me.  (513)
